activities: Kigo is a Software as a Service (SaaS) system for lodging companies around the world. We serve as a data processor for our clients. Our clients collect traveler information such as name, email, phone and address for people staying in their properties. In some cases they also collect credit card information. The data processing system is PCI compliant.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We serve as an automated data processor for our clients. Our clients collect traveler information such as name, email, phone and address for people staying in their properties. In some cases they also collect credit card information.
recoursemech: We utilize in-house complaint resolution and participate in the Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor dispute resolution program for any complaints that cannot be resolved directly in-house.
